text: The list of Egyptian scientists includes *Ahmed Zewail, got Nobel Prize for Chemistry; Chemistry; died in 2016 *Boutros Boutros-Ghali, was United Nations Secretary-General; a leading figure in the peace process between Egypt and Israel; Law; died in 2016 *Ibrahim Abouleish, founder of SEKEM - an organization for biodynamic farming methods; got the Right Livelihood Award; Pharmacology; died in 2017 *Mamdouh Eldamaty, is a former Minister of Antiquities; egyptologist; born 1961 ==From areas that later became Egypt== * Euclid of Alexandria, known for Euclidean geometry, Euclid's Elements, Euclidean algorithm; died in the middle of 3rd century BC ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Africa ==References== * Egyptian Scientists
title: List of Egyptian scientists
